text: Ai Rab, tū apne munsifānā kāmoṅ meṅ wafādār rahā hai! Ab bhī is kā lihāz kar aur apne saḳht ġhazab ko apne shahr aur muqaddas pahāṛ Yarūshalam se dūr kar! Yarūshalam aur terī qaum gird-o-nawāh kī qaumoṅ ke lie mazāq kā nishānā ban gaī hai, go ham mānte haiṅ ki yih hamāre gunāhoṅ aur hamāre bāpdādā kī ḳhatāoṅ kī wajah se ho rahā hai.
